text:
Message 1510 of 4024
Would you like to discuss what’s next and debrief on Dr Brown? Specifically if the plan is still in accordance with what we sent, as you thought. Or
has she just gone ahead with an alternative agenda at this point?
I don’t care to fight but we double down on what has never worked every week. And now the total blackout on communications means our list is
stacking higher every day, so love to hear your thoughts on that.
Most importantly, since everything has gotten really awful since we quit Debbie and ignored Dr Brown, if you are looking into providers as promised.
We can say we don’t need it, but history says otherwise.
Just let me know...
Sent:02/19/2024 at 08:59 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/20/2024 at 05:52 AM)
Subject:Next Steps
Message 1511 of 4024
As I understand next steps, Dr Brown will speak with you Friday then come back with some options for us to consider into the parenting plan.
We take that then try finalize something so our layers can make that a legal document.
Let’s move this forward. I’m hopeful we can align on something we both can agree to.
I’m meeting Milo and Christina on Saturday to discuss summer schedules. I’ve missed a lot of sign up dates already unfortunately except Camp
Orkila for Adrian. I’d love to get that squared away soon. Max and Parker are trying to connect for a couple of weeks too.
Sent:02/20/2024 at 05:56 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/20/2024 at 07:33 AM)
Subject:Re: Next Steps
Message 1512 of 4024
Thanks for the update. I’ll need to step away from this for a bit because as I read ...
- You won’t make an effort outside of this to talk
- We’re not doing as agreed ‘in writing’ with Dr Brown
- You “understand” that, and are moving forward
- I clearly could have helped with ADs summer camps
- Our ‘list’ efforts will only get worse, but that’s ok
I don’t want another week like last week. I offered a peaceful solution to work together and was cooperative all weekend. Yet it’s Tuesday and things
have only gotten worse with every passing day.
I really have to step away...
Sent:02/20/2024 at 07:51 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/20/2024 at 09:10 AM)
Subject:Re: Next Steps
